unbound elemental.name: Unbound Elemental
unbound elemental.flavor: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.
unbound elemental.text: Whenever you play a card with Overload, gain +1/+1.

holy nova.name: Holy Nova
holy nova.flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.
holy nova.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.

master swordsmith.name: Master Swordsmith
master swordsmith.flavor: He's currently trying to craft a "flail-axe", but all the other swordsmiths say it can't be done.
master swordsmith.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.

shadowboxer.name: Shadowboxer
shadowboxer.flavor: Punching is its primary function. Also, its secondary function.
shadowboxer.text: Whenever a character is healed, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

warhorse trainer.name: Warhorse Trainer
warhorse trainer.flavor: He doesn't even get Sundays off.  Every day he's hostling.
warhorse trainer.text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +1 Attack.

webspinner.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
webspinner.name: Webspinner
webspinner.flavor: Spider cocoons are like little pi√±atas!
webspinner.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Beast card to your hand.
webspinner.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

stranglethorn tiger.name: Stranglethorn Tiger
stranglethorn tiger.flavor: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

silverback patriarch.name: Silverback Patriarch
silverback patriarch.flavor: He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

c'thun's chosen.name: C'Thun's Chosen
c'thun's chosen.flavor: He gave her a promise ring and everything.
c'thun's chosen.text: [x]Divine Shield Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).

spawn of shadows.name: Spawn of Shadows
spawn of shadows.flavor: What did you expect to happen?  He's a Spawn.  Of Shadows.

glaivezooka.name: Glaivezooka
glaivezooka.flavor: For the times when a regular bazooka just isn't enough.
glaivezooka.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion +1 Attack.

void crusher.name: Void Crusher
void crusher.text: Inspire: Destroy a random minion for each player.

iron juggernaut.name: Iron Juggernaut
iron juggernaut.flavor: The Iron Juggernaut guards Orgrimmar and has just earned the "Employee of the Month" award!
iron juggernaut.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Mine into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 10 damage.

unstable ghoul.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
unstable ghoul.name: Unstable Ghoul
unstable ghoul.flavor: Filling your Ghouls with Rocket Fuel is all the rage at Necromancer school.
unstable ghoul.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

holy wrath.name: Holy Wrath
holy wrath.text: Draw a card and deal damage equal to its cost.

power word: glory.name: Power Word: Glory
power word: glory.flavor: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding.  Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!
power word: glory.text:
Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health to
your hero.

stormwind knight.name: Stormwind Knight
stormwind knight.flavor: They're still embarassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

entomb.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
entomb.name: Entomb
entomb.flavor: It's perfectly safe as long as you remember to put in air holes.
entomb.text:
Choose an enemy minion.
Shuffle it into your deck.
entomb.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

murloc tinyfin.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
murloc tinyfin.name: Murloc Tinyfin
murloc tinyfin.flavor: High mortality rate, from often being hugged to death.
murloc tinyfin.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

confuse.name: Confuse
confuse.text: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions.

shadowflame.name: Shadowflame
shadowflame.flavor: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!
shadowflame.text: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.

ancestral healing.name: Ancestral Healing
ancestral healing.flavor: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.
ancestral healing.text: Restore a minion to full Health and give it Taunt.

lava shock.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
lava shock.name: Lava Shock
lava shock.flavor: Chocolate lava cake is shockingly delicious.
lava shock.text: Deal $2 damage. Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
lava shock.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

gazlowe.name: Gazlowe
gazlowe.flavor: Gazlowe was voted "Most Likely to Explode" in high school.
gazlowe.text: Whenever you cast a 1-mana spell, add a random Mech to your hand.

darkshire librarian.name: Darkshire Librarian
darkshire librarian.flavor: Do NOT be late with your overdue fines.
darkshire librarian.text: Battlecry: Discard a random card. Deathrattle: Draw a card.

lance carrier.name: Lance Carrier
lance carrier.flavor: Lance Carrier is an obscure entry level position in orcish armies.  A mystery, since orcs don't generally use lances.

mind control tech.name: Mind Control Tech
mind control tech.flavor: Mind Control technology is getting better, but that's not saying much.
mind control tech.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 4 or more minions, take control of one at random.

c'thun.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked after opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
c'thun.name: C'Thun
c'thun.flavor: C'Thun's least favorite Hearthstone card: Eye for an Eye.
c'thun.text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack randomly split among all enemies.
c'thun.howToEarn: Unlocked when opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.

faceless behemoth.name: Faceless Behemoth
faceless behemoth.flavor: Rejected names: Forty-Foot Faceless, Big ol' No-face, Huge Creature Sans Face, Teddy.

faceless manipulator.name: Faceless Manipulator
faceless manipulator.flavor: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.
faceless manipulator.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
faceless manipulator.targetingArrowText: Become a copy of a minion.

mindgames.name: Mindgames
mindgames.flavor: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.
mindgames.text: Put a copy of a random minion from your opponent's deck into the battlefield.

mechwarper.name: Mechwarper
mechwarper.flavor: Mechs that summon mechs? What's next? Donuts that summon donuts? Mmmmm.

shado-pan rider.name: Shado-Pan Rider
shado-pan rider.flavor: He needed a break after that business in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms. Naturally, he chose to spend his vacation in an icy snowscape killing monsters.

ice lance.name: Ice Lance
ice lance.flavor: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.
ice lance.text: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal $4 damage instead.

malkorok.name: Malkorok
malkorok.flavor: Garrosh's best buddy. It's true. Look it up.

twilight whelp.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
twilight whelp.name: Twilight Whelp
twilight whelp.flavor: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.
twilight whelp.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +2 Health.
twilight whelp.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

coghammer.name: Coghammer
coghammer.flavor: So you ripped this out of a machine, carved some runes on it, stuck it on a handle, and now it's a weapon of great divine power? Seems legit.
coghammer.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield and Taunt.

tirion fordring.name: Tirion Fordring
tirion fordring.flavor: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

hunter's mark.name: Hunter's Mark
hunter's mark.flavor: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

nourish.name: Nourish
nourish.flavor: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.
nourish.text: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.

savannah highmane.name: Savannah Highmane
savannah highmane.flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

lightning bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning bolt.flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

pit lord.name: Pit Lord
pit lord.flavor: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

fist of jaraxxus.name: Fist of Jaraxxus
fist of jaraxxus.text: When you play or discard this, deal $4 damage to a random enemy.

haunted creeper.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
haunted creeper.name: Haunted Creeper
haunted creeper.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

lightspawn.name: Lightspawn
lightspawn.flavor: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?
lightspawn.text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.

fan of knives.name: Fan of Knives
fan of knives.flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.
fan of knives.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw a card.

echo of medivh.name: Echo of Medivh
echo of medivh.flavor: Medivh's echo haunts Karazhan, eternally cheating at chess and Hearthstone.
echo of medivh.text: Put a copy of each friendly minion into your hand.

revenge.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.flavor: This is better than Arcane Explosion, so I guess warriors are finally getting revenge on mages for Mortal Strike being worse than Fireball.
revenge.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $3 damage instead.
revenge.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

excavated evil.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
excavated evil.name: Excavated Evil
excavated evil.flavor: MOM! DAD! DON'T TOUCH IT! IT'S EVIL!!!!!!
excavated evil.text:
Deal $3 damage to all minions.
Shuffle this card into your opponent's deck.
excavated evil.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

lava burst.name: Lava Burst
lava burst.flavor: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

flame imp.name: Flame Imp
flame imp.flavor: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

king's defender.name: King's Defender
king's defender.flavor: "King's Attacker" is a shield.  Funny, huh?
king's defender.text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Taunt, gain +1 Durability.

shieldbearer.name: Shieldbearer
shieldbearer.flavor: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game??  This is no easy job.

bomb lobber.name: Bomb Lobber
bomb lobber.flavor: He lobbies Orgrimmar daily on behalf of bombs.
bomb lobber.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.

shield block.name: Shield Block
shield block.flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

priestess of elune.name: Priestess of Elune
priestess of elune.flavor: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

trade prince gallywix.name: Trade Prince Gallywix
trade prince gallywix.flavor: Gallywix believes in supply and demand. He supplies the beatings and demands you pay up!
trade prince gallywix.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain a copy of it and give them a Coin.

chromaggus.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
chromaggus.name: Chromaggus
chromaggus.flavor: Left head and right head can never agree about what to eat for dinner, so they always end up just eating ramen again.
chromaggus.text: Whenever you draw a card, put another copy into your hand.
chromaggus.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

preparation.name: Preparation
preparation.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less.

spellbreaker.name: Spellbreaker
spellbreaker.flavor: Spellbreakers can rip enchantments from magic-wielders.  The process is painless and can be performed on an outpatient basis.

mal'ganis.name: Mal'Ganis
mal'ganis.flavor: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.
mal'ganis.text: Your other Demons have +2/+2. Your hero is Immune.

sen'jin shieldmasta.name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
sen'jin shieldmasta.flavor: Sen'jin Villiage is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

arcane intellect.name: Arcane Intellect
arcane intellect.flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

forgotten torch.howToEarnGolden: Can be crafted after starting the League of Explorers adventure.
forgotten torch.name: Forgotten Torch
forgotten torch.flavor: Why does a forgotten torch turn into a roaring torch with no provocation?  It's one of life's many mysteries.
forgotten torch.text: Deal $3 damage. Shuffle a 'Roaring Torch' into your deck that deals 6 damage.
forgotten torch.howToEarn: Unlocked by starting the League of Explorers adventure.

venture co. mercenary.name: Venture Co. Mercenary
venture co. mercenary.flavor: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.

steward of darkshire.name: Steward of Darkshire
steward of darkshire.flavor: Turns out divine shields are way cheaper if you buy in bulk.
steward of darkshire.text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it Divine Shield.

velen's chosen.name: Velen's Chosen
velen's chosen.flavor: Velen wrote a "Lovely Card" for Tyrande with a picture of the Deeprun Tram that said "I Choo-Choo-Choose you!"

foe reaper 4000.name: Foe Reaper 4000
foe reaper 4000.flavor: Foe reaping is really not so different from harvest reaping, at the end of the day.
foe reaper 4000.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever he attacks.

fossilized devilsaur.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
fossilized devilsaur.name: Fossilized Devilsaur
fossilized devilsaur.flavor: This was the only job he could get after the dinosaur theme park debacle.
fossilized devilsaur.text: Battlecry: If you control a Beast, gain Taunt.
fossilized devilsaur.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

zombie chow.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
zombie chow.name: Zombie Chow
zombie chow.text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
zombie chow.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

blood imp.name: Blood Imp
blood imp.flavor: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.
blood imp.text: Stealth. At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.

zealous initiate.name: Zealous Initiate
zealous initiate.flavor: Ok, Initiate. You need to settle down and do your job. In this case, that means die so someone else can get a minor buff.

defias ringleader.name: Defias Ringleader
defias ringleader.flavor: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

bloodsail raider.name: Bloodsail Raider
bloodsail raider.flavor: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."
bloodsail raider.text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.

claw.name: Claw
claw.flavor: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.
claw.text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn and 2 Armor.

savage roar.name: Savage Roar
savage roar.flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.
savage roar.text: Give your characters +2 Attack this turn.

bloodsail corsair.name: Bloodsail Corsair
bloodsail corsair.flavor: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers.  It's called the "Pirate's Code".
bloodsail corsair.text: Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.

explosive trap.name: Explosive Trap
explosive trap.flavor: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!
explosive trap.text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal $2 damage to all enemies.

yogg-saron, hope's end.name: Yogg-Saron, Hope's End
yogg-saron, hope's end.flavor: I spell your doom... Y-O-U-R D-O-O-M!
yogg-saron, hope's end.text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell for each spell you've cast this game (targets chosen randomly).

dragonkin sorcerer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
dragonkin sorcerer.name: Dragonkin Sorcerer
dragonkin sorcerer.flavor: Dragonkin Sorcerers be all "I'm a wizard" and everyone else be all "daaaaang".
dragonkin sorcerer.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain +1/+1.
dragonkin sorcerer.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

mounted raptor.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
mounted raptor.name: Mounted Raptor
mounted raptor.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cairne bloodhoof.name: Cairne Bloodhoof
cairne bloodhoof.flavor: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It's pretty insensitive.

embrace the shadow.name: Embrace the Shadow
embrace the shadow.flavor: For when your Auchenai Soulpriests call in sick.
embrace the shadow.text: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.

naturalize.name: Naturalize
naturalize.text: Destroy a minion. Your opponent draws 2 cards.

truesilver champion.name: Truesilver Champion
truesilver champion.flavor: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)
truesilver champion.text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it.

demolisher.name: Demolisher
demolisher.flavor: Laying siege isn't fun for anyone.  It's not even all that effective, now that everyone has a flying mount.
demolisher.text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.

sense demons.name: Sense Demons
sense demons.flavor: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don‚Äôt need a spell to sense them.
sense demons.text: Put 2 random Demons from your deck into your hand.

disciple of c'thun.name: Disciple of C'Thun
disciple of c'thun.flavor: C‚ÄôThun‚Äôs recruiting pitch involves cookies, which is why it‚Äôs the most popular Old God.
disciple of c'thun.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).

sir finley mrrgglton.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
sir finley mrrgglton.name: Sir Finley Mrrgglton
sir finley mrrgglton.flavor: In addition to fluent Common, he also speaks fourteen dialects of 'mrgl'.
sir finley mrrgglton.text: Battlecry: Discover a new basic Hero Power.
sir finley mrrgglton.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

forked lightning.name: Forked Lightning
forked lightning.flavor: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.
forked lightning.text: Deal $2 damage to 2 random enemy minions. Overload: (2)

core hound.name: Core Hound
core hound.flavor: You don‚Äôt tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

keeper of the grove.name: Keeper of the Grove
keeper of the grove.flavor: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.
keeper of the grove.text: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Silence a minion.

injured kvaldir.name: Injured Kvaldir
injured kvaldir.flavor: Don't worry.  With a little skin cream he's going to clear right up.

feign death.name: Feign Death
feign death.flavor: The hardest part about doing a "Feign Death" convincingly is learning how to make the right smell. It takes a lot of commitment.

steamwheedle sniper.name: Steamwheedle Sniper
steamwheedle sniper.flavor: Goblins seldom have the patience for sniping. Most prefer lobbing explosives.
steamwheedle sniper.text: Your Hero Power can target minions.

prophet velen.name: Prophet Velen
prophet velen.flavor: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.
prophet velen.text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.

raven idol.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
raven idol.name: Raven Idol
raven idol.flavor: Was petrified when it found out it didn't make the cut for Azerothean Idol.
raven idol.text: Choose One - Discover a minion; or Discover a spell.
raven idol.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

northshire cleric.name: Northshire Cleric
northshire cleric.flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.
northshire cleric.text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.

sabotage.name: Sabotage
sabotage.flavor: Rogues can't stand it. They know you planned it! They are going to set you straight!
sabotage.text: Destroy a random enemy minion. Combo: And your opponent's weapon.

voidcaller.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
voidcaller.name: Voidcaller
voidcaller.text: Deathrattle: Put a random Demon from your hand into the battlefield.
voidcaller.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

blood warriors.name: Blood Warriors
blood warriors.flavor: They have an uneasy rivalry with the Blood Paladins.
blood warriors.text: Add a copy of each damaged friendly minion to your hand.

faceless summoner.name: Faceless Summoner
faceless summoner.flavor: They never get the recognition they deserve.

crazed worshipper.name: Crazed Worshipper
crazed worshipper.flavor: Every month they share a pancake breakfast with the Perfectly Rational Worshippers.
crazed worshipper.text: Taunt. Whenever this minion takes damage, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).

aviana.name: Aviana
aviana.flavor: Call her "Tweety".  She'll find it real funny.  I PROMISE.

thrallmar farseer.name: Thrallmar Farseer
thrallmar farseer.flavor: He's stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he's hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

arathi weaponsmith.name: Arathi Weaponsmith
arathi weaponsmith.flavor: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

chillmaw.name: Chillmaw
chillmaw.flavor: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!
chillmaw.text: Taunt Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.

tournament attendee.name: Tournament Attendee
tournament attendee.flavor: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament.  He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.

ancestor's call.name: Ancestor's Call
ancestor's call.text: Put a random minion from each player's hand into the battlefield.

power word: shield.name: Power Word: Shield
power word: shield.flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.
power word: shield.text:
Give a minion +2 Health.
Draw a card.

corrupted healbot.name: Corrupted Healbot
corrupted healbot.flavor: Not so much "corrupted" as "has terrible aim".
corrupted healbot.text: Deathrattle: Restore 8 Health to the enemy hero.

southsea deckhand.name: Southsea Deckhand
southsea deckhand.flavor: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".
southsea deckhand.text: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.

shade of naxxramas.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
shade of naxxramas.name: Shade of Naxxramas
shade of naxxramas.flavor: The Shades of Naxxramas hate the living. They even have a slur they use to refer them: Livers.
shade of naxxramas.text: Stealth. At the start of your turn, gain +1/+1.
shade of naxxramas.howToEarn: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

refreshment vendor.name: Refreshment Vendor
refreshment vendor.flavor: Menu:  Funnel cakes, carrots, popcorn, jormungar steaks.  It's hard serving a diverse clientele.

guardian of kings.name: Guardian of Kings
guardian of kings.flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so clich√©!

mekgineer thermaplugg.name: Mekgineer Thermaplugg
mekgineer thermaplugg.flavor: He was obsessed with explosives until he discovered knitting. Now he yells, ‚ÄúSWEATERS! MORE SWEATERS!‚Äù
mekgineer thermaplugg.text: Whenever an enemy minion dies, summon a Leper Gnome.

unearthed raptor.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
unearthed raptor.name: Unearthed Raptor
unearthed raptor.flavor: Still hunting for the ones who earthed him.
unearthed raptor.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its Deathrattle effect.
unearthed raptor.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

shadow word: pain.name: Shadow Word: Pain
shadow word: pain.flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".
shadow word: pain.text: Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack.

frost shock.name: Frost Shock
frost shock.text: Deal $1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.

validated doomsayer.name: Validated Doomsayer
validated doomsayer.flavor: Really feels good about himself and is in a much better place now. But‚Ä¶ he sure does miss piloting those shredders.
validated doomsayer.text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 7.

light's justice.name: Light's Justice
light's justice.flavor: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

garrison commander.name: Garrison Commander
garrison commander.flavor: He'll never admit it, but he pushes you hard because he really cares about you.
garrison commander.text: You can use your Hero Power twice a turn.

commanding shout.name: Commanding Shout
commanding shout.flavor: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training
commanding shout.text: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn. Draw a card.

silence.name: Silence
silence.flavor: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

core rager.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
core rager.name: Core Rager
core rager.flavor: It takes a special kind of hunter to venture deep into a firey lava pit and convince a monster who lives there to come home and be a cuddly housepet.
core rager.text: Battlecry: If your hand is empty, gain +3/+3.
core rager.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

backstab.name: Backstab
backstab.flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.
backstab.text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.

illuminator.name: Illuminator
illuminator.flavor: "LUMOS!" is not what they yell. What do you think this is, Hogwarts?
illuminator.text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, restore 4 Health to your hero.

sunfury protector.name: Sunfury Protector
sunfury protector.flavor: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.

dragon egg.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
dragon egg.name: Dragon Egg
dragon egg.flavor: Think of them as bullets for your dragon gun.
dragon egg.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/1 Whelp.
dragon egg.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

mana tide totem.name: Mana Tide Totem
mana tide totem.flavor: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.
mana tide totem.text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.

stampeding kodo.name: Stampeding Kodo
stampeding kodo.flavor: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.
stampeding kodo.text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.

dragonhawk rider.name: Dragonhawk Rider
dragonhawk rider.flavor: Check it out.  You can do barrel rolls on this thing.

clockwork gnome.name: Clockwork Gnome
clockwork gnome.flavor: Clockwork gnomes are always asking what time it is.
clockwork gnome.text: Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.

ogre magi.name: Ogre Magi
ogre magi.flavor: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

kidnapper.name: Kidnapper
kidnapper.flavor: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.
kidnapper.text: Combo: Return a minion to its owner's hand.

tomb pillager.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
tomb pillager.name: Tomb Pillager
tomb pillager.flavor: After the guild broke up, he could no longer raid the tombs.
tomb pillager.text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
tomb pillager.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

dart trap.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
dart trap.name: Dart Trap
dart trap.flavor: Five years of tap-dancing lessons are FINALLY going to pay off!
dart trap.text: Secret: After an opposing Hero Power is used, deal $5 damage to a random enemy.
dart trap.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

clockwork knight.name: Clockwork Knight
clockwork knight.flavor: It takes a lot to wind him up.

nefarian.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
nefarian.name: Nefarian
nefarian.flavor: They call him "Blackwing" because he's a black dragon...... and he's got wings.
nefarian.text: Battlecry: Add 2 random spells to your hand (from your opponent's class).
nefarian.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

tinkertown technician.name: Tinkertown Technician
tinkertown technician.flavor: Won't you take me to... Tinkertown?
tinkertown technician.text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, gain +1/+1 and add a Spare Part to your hand.

infested wolf.name: Infested Wolf
infested wolf.flavor: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

fandral staghelm.name: Fandral Staghelm
fandral staghelm.flavor: Always manages to mention "Back when I was creating the World Tree‚Ä¶" in EVERY conversation. Sheesh! Enough already.
fandral staghelm.text: Your Choose One cards have both effects combined.

wisps of the old gods.name: Wisps of the Old Gods
wisps of the old gods.flavor: They're just normal wisps, actually. The "Of the Old Gods" bit is just marketing.
wisps of the old gods.text: Choose One - Summon seven 1/1 Wisps; or Give your minions +2/+2.

youthful brewmaster.name: Youthful Brewmaster
youthful brewmaster.flavor: His youthful enthusiasm doesn‚Äôt always equal excellence in his brews.   Don‚Äôt drink the Mogu Stout!
youthful brewmaster.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
youthful brewmaster.targetingArrowText: Return a minion to your hand.

divine spirit.name: Divine Spirit
divine spirit.flavor: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

doomsayer.name: Doomsayer
doomsayer.flavor: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.
doomsayer.text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.

grand crusader.name: Grand Crusader
grand crusader.flavor: A veteran of a number of crusades, she is a force for light and goodness.  Her latest crusade is against goblin telemarketers.
grand crusader.text: Battlecry: Add a random Paladin card to your hand.

junkbot.name: Junkbot
junkbot.flavor: One bot's junk is another bot's AWESOME UPGRADE!
junkbot.text: Whenever a friendly Mech dies, gain +2/+2.

death's bite.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
death's bite.name: Death's Bite
death's bite.flavor: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord
death's bite.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

arcane golem.name: Arcane Golem
arcane golem.flavor: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.
arcane golem.text: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.

frostbolt.name: Frostbolt
frostbolt.flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.
frostbolt.text: Deal $3 damage to a character and Freeze it.

silvermoon guardian.name: Silvermoon Guardian
silvermoon guardian.flavor: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didn‚Äôt go so well‚Ä¶

young dragonhawk.name: Young Dragonhawk
young dragonhawk.flavor: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

power of the wild.name: Power of the Wild
power of the wild.flavor: Never look a panther in the eye.  Or is it 'Always look a panther in the eye'?  Well, it's one of those.
power of the wild.text: Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther.

inner fire.name: Inner Fire
inner fire.flavor: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.
inner fire.text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.

wisp.name: Wisp
wisp.flavor: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode.   But why?

bash.name: Bash
bash.flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice.  It doesn't.

tournament medic.name: Tournament Medic
tournament medic.flavor: The medic tournament is less entertaining than the Grand Tournament.

ancient of war.name: Ancient of War
ancient of war.flavor: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

master of ceremonies.name: Master of Ceremonies
master of ceremonies.text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Spell Damage, gain +2/+2.

flamecannon.name: Flamecannon
flamecannon.flavor: Calling something a flamecannon really doesn't do much to distinguish it from other goblin devices.
flamecannon.text: Deal $4 damage to a random enemy minion.

ragnaros the firelord.name: Ragnaros the Firelord
ragnaros the firelord.flavor: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord.  Summoning Ragnaros often doesn‚Äôt work out the way you want it to.
ragnaros the firelord.text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.

bloodsail cultist.name: Bloodsail Cultist
bloodsail cultist.flavor: They're really just in it for the Blood Parrot.
bloodsail cultist.text: Battlecry: If you control a Pirate, give your weapon +1/+1.

gladiator's longbow.name: Gladiator's Longbow
gladiator's longbow.flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

holy champion.name: Holy Champion
holy champion.flavor: She really likes seeing people get better.  That's why she hurts them in the first place.
holy champion.text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.

molten giant.name: Molten Giant
molten giant.flavor: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.
molten giant.text: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.

knife juggler.name: Knife Juggler
knife juggler.flavor: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers.    They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.
knife juggler.text: After you summon a minion, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

forbidden ritual.name: Forbidden Ritual
forbidden ritual.flavor: Actually, C'Thun gives his full support for this ritual.
forbidden ritual.text: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 1/1 Tentacles.

enhance-o mechano.name: Enhance-o Mechano
enhance-o mechano.text: Battlecry: Give your other minions Windfury, Taunt, or Divine Shield. (at random)

neptulon.name: Neptulon
neptulon.flavor: Neptulon is "The Tidehunter". He‚Äôs one of the four elemental lords. And he and Ragnaros get together and make really amazing saunas.
neptulon.text: Battlecry: Add 4 random Murlocs to your hand. Overload: (3)

bolvar fordragon.name: Bolvar Fordragon
bolvar fordragon.flavor: Spoiler alert: Bolvar gets melted and then sits on an ice throne and everyone forgets about him.
bolvar fordragon.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1 Attack.

counterspell.name: Counterspell
counterspell.flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.
counterspell.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.

renounce darkness.name: Renounce Darkness
renounce darkness.text: Replace your Hero Power and Warlock cards with another class's. The cards cost (1) less.

animated armor.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
animated armor.name: Animated Armor
animated armor.flavor: Try putting it on.  Wait, let me get my camera.
animated armor.text: Your hero can only take 1 damage at a time.
animated armor.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

justicar trueheart.name: Justicar Trueheart
justicar trueheart.flavor: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.
justicar trueheart.text: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.

mana wyrm.name: Mana Wyrm
mana wyrm.flavor: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.
mana wyrm.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.

shadow strike.name: Shadow Strike
shadow strike.flavor: It's like a backstab, only from the front. And with two more stabs.
shadow strike.text: Deal $5 damage to an undamaged character.

bear trap.name: Bear Trap
bear trap.flavor: You'll never guess what's in that conveniently bear-sized, bear-smelling box.
bear trap.text: Secret: After your hero is attacked, summon a 3/3 Bear with Taunt.

infest.name: Infest
infest.flavor: The best part is the look on their face when you jump out of the cake! Err‚Ä¶ corpse.
infest.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Beast to your hand."

murloc warleader.name: Murloc Warleader
murloc warleader.flavor: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound?  Nope!  Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

y'shaarj, rage unbound.name: Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound
y'shaarj, rage unbound.flavor: When he's working out, he binds all that rage back into a ponytail.
y'shaarj, rage unbound.text: At the end of your turn, put a minion from your deck into the battlefield.

volcanic lumberer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
volcanic lumberer.name: Volcanic Lumberer
volcanic lumberer.flavor: The roots, the roots, the roots is on fire!
volcanic lumberer.text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
volcanic lumberer.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

stormcrack.name: Stormcrack
stormcrack.flavor: WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE PURPLE BALL OF LIGHTNING

flame leviathan.name: Flame Leviathan
flame leviathan.flavor: Mimiron likes to take the Flame Leviathan out on some sweet joyrides.
flame leviathan.text: When you draw this, deal 2 damage to all characters.

annoy-o-tron.name: Annoy-o-Tron
annoy-o-tron.flavor: The inventor of the Annoy-o-Tron was immediately expelled from Tinkerschool, Tinkertown, and was eventually exiled from the Eastern Kingdoms altogether.

power overwhelming.name: Power Overwhelming
power overwhelming.flavor: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It's CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don't do it.
power overwhelming.text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.

mark of the wild.name: Mark of the Wild
mark of the wild.flavor: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.
mark of the wild.text: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+2. (+2 Attack/+2 Health)

frothing berserker.name: Frothing Berserker
frothing berserker.flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.
frothing berserker.text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.

king's elekk.name: King's Elekk
king's elekk.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.

dunemaul shaman.name: Dunemaul Shaman
dunemaul shaman.flavor: He just closes his eyes and goes for it. Raarararrrarar!
dunemaul shaman.text: Windfury, Overload: (1) 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.

call pet.name: Call Pet
call pet.text:
Draw a card.
If it's a Beast, it costs (4) less.

loatheb.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
loatheb.name: Loatheb
loatheb.flavor: Loatheb used to be a simple Bog Beast.  This is why we need stricter regulations on mining and agriculture.
loatheb.text: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
loatheb.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

armorsmith.name: Armorsmith
armorsmith.flavor: She accepts guild funds for repairs!
armorsmith.text: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, gain 1 Armor.

ancient of lore.name: Ancient of Lore
ancient of lore.flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.
ancient of lore.text: Choose One - Draw a card; or Restore 5 Health.

wild growth.name: Wild Growth
wild growth.flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

anub'arak.name: Anub'arak
anub'arak.flavor: Was actually a pretty nice guy before, you know, the whole Lich King thing.
anub'arak.text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand and summon a 4/4 Nerubian.

imp-losion.name: Imp-losion
imp-losion.flavor: The shrapnel is waaaaay worse than the explosion.
imp-losion.text: Deal $2-$4 damage to a minion. Summon a 1/1 Imp for each damage dealt.

sacrificial pact.name: Sacrificial Pact
sacrificial pact.flavor: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.
sacrificial pact.text: Destroy a Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.

solemn vigil.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
solemn vigil.name: Solemn Vigil
solemn vigil.flavor: Each year, folk gather in front of Blackrock Mountain to mourn those who were mind-controlled into the lava.
solemn vigil.text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
solemn vigil.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

grimscale oracle.name: Grimscale Oracle
grimscale oracle.flavor: These are the brainy murlocs.  It turns out that doesn‚Äôt mean much.

cold blood.name: Cold Blood
cold blood.flavor: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"
cold blood.text: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.

noble sacrifice.name: Noble Sacrifice
noble sacrifice.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.

ancient mage.name: Ancient Mage
ancient mage.flavor: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else's game.

battle rage.name: Battle Rage
battle rage.flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."
battle rage.text: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.

hex.name: Hex
hex.flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?
hex.text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.

dr. boom.name: Dr. Boom
dr. boom.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.

confessor paletress.name: Confessor Paletress
confessor paletress.flavor: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears.  Most common fear:  Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

armored warhorse.name: Armored Warhorse
armored warhorse.flavor: Yep.  It's a horse... wearing armor... going to war.
armored warhorse.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Charge.

piloted sky golem.name: Piloted Sky Golem
piloted sky golem.flavor: The pinnacle of goblin engineering. Includes an espresso machine and foot massager.

sea giant.name: Sea Giant
sea giant.text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.

shadow madness.name: Shadow Madness
shadow madness.flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.
shadow madness.text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.

far sight.name: Far Sight
far sight.flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.
far sight.text: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.

recruiter.name: Recruiter
recruiter.flavor: Join the Argent Crusade!  We have attractive tabards and you get to carry really nice swords!
recruiter.text: Inspire: Add a 2/2 Squire to your hand.

saboteur.name: Saboteur
saboteur.flavor: Listen all y'all it's a saboteur!
saboteur.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's Hero Power costs (5) more next turn.

grove tender.name: Grove Tender
grove tender.flavor: Likes: Hiking and the great outdoors. Dislikes: Goblin shredders and sandals. (Can‚Äôt find any that fit!).
grove tender.text: Choose One - Give each player a Mana Crystal; or Each player draws a card.

argent watchman.name: Argent Watchman
argent watchman.flavor: Who argent watches the Argent Watchman?
argent watchman.text: Can't attack. Inspire: Can attack as normal this turn.

argent lance.name: Argent Lance
argent lance.flavor: The stripes make it look like a candy cane, but we recommend against licking it.
argent lance.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, +1 Durability.

feugen.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
feugen.name: Feugen
feugen.flavor: Feugen is sad because everyone likes Stalagg better.
feugen.text: Deathrattle: If Stalagg also died this game, summon Thaddius.
feugen.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

charged hammer.name: Charged Hammer
charged hammer.flavor: You can only pick it up if you are worthy.

twisting nether.name: Twisting Nether
twisting nether.flavor: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

holy light.name: Holy Light
holy light.flavor: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

hungry dragon.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
hungry dragon.name: Hungry Dragon
hungry dragon.flavor: Hungry Hungry Dragon is NOT a fun game.
hungry dragon.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for your opponent.
hungry dragon.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

bouncing blade.name: Bouncing Blade
bouncing blade.flavor: Only goblins would think this was a good idea. Even they are starting to have their doubts.
bouncing blade.text: Deal $1 damage to a random minion. Repeat until a minion dies.

maiden of the lake.name: Maiden of the Lake
maiden of the lake.flavor: Not a good basis for a system of government.

captain greenskin.name: Captain Greenskin
captain greenskin.flavor: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

mulch.name: Mulch
mulch.flavor: Is this a noun or a verb?  We will never know.
mulch.text:
Destroy a minion.
Add a random minion to your opponent's hand.

feral rage.name: Feral Rage
feral rage.flavor: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.
feral rage.text: Choose One - Give your hero +4 Attack this turn; or Gain 8 Armor.

thoughtsteal.name: Thoughtsteal
thoughtsteal.flavor: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke
thoughtsteal.text: Copy 2 cards from your opponent's deck and put them into your hand.

mini-mage.name: Mini-Mage
mini-mage.flavor: He is sometimes found hiding in the treasure chest in the Gurubashi Arena.

goblin sapper.name: Goblin Sapper
goblin sapper.flavor: He‚Äôs not such a binge exploder anymore. These days, he only explodes socially.
goblin sapper.text: Has +4 Attack while your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand.

powershot.name: Powershot
powershot.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.

stoneskin gargoyle.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
stoneskin gargoyle.name: Stoneskin Gargoyle
stoneskin gargoyle.text: At the start of your turn, restore this minion to full Health.
stoneskin gargoyle.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

spellbender.name: Spellbender
spellbender.flavor: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.
spellbender.text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.

tunnel trogg.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
tunnel trogg.name: Tunnel Trogg
tunnel trogg.flavor: Sure, they're ugly, but they live in tunnels.  You try your beauty routine without natural light.
tunnel trogg.text: Whenever you Overload, gain +1 Attack per locked Mana Crystal.
tunnel trogg.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

sap.name: Sap
sap.text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.

mech-bear-cat.name: Mech-Bear-Cat
mech-bear-cat.flavor: Crushes buildings with his BEAR hands.
mech-bear-cat.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, add a Spare Part card to your hand.

murloc tidecaller.name: Murloc Tidecaller
murloc tidecaller.flavor: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.
murloc tidecaller.text: Whenever a Murloc is summoned, gain +1 Attack.

slam.name: Slam
slam.flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.
slam.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.

mirror entity.name: Mirror Entity
mirror entity.flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.
mirror entity.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.

voodoo doctor.name: Voodoo Doctor
voodoo doctor.flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

multi-shot.name: Multi-Shot
multi-shot.text: Deal $3 damage to two random enemy minions.

ancient watcher.name: Ancient Watcher
ancient watcher.flavor: Why do its eyes seem to follow you as you walk by?

corruption.name: Corruption
corruption.flavor: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOM!  Corrupted!
corruption.text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.

varian wrynn.name: Varian Wrynn
varian wrynn.flavor: Leader of the Alliance!  Father of Anduin!  Also he likes to play Arena, and he averages 12 wins.
varian wrynn.text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards. Put any minions you drew directly into the battlefield.

cabalist's tome.name: Cabalist's Tome
cabalist's tome.flavor: What's in there? I bet it's cookie recipes!
cabalist's tome.text: Add 3 random Mage spells to your hand.

doomhammer.name: Doomhammer
doomhammer.flavor: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

ragnaros, lightlord.name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
ragnaros, lightlord.flavor: What happens when you try and corrupt a corrupted firelord? DOUBLE NEGATIVE, INSECT!
ragnaros, lightlord.text: At the end of your turn, restore 8 Health to a damaged friendly character.

fallen hero.name: Fallen Hero
fallen hero.text: Your Hero Power deals 1 extra damage.

echoing ooze.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
echoing ooze.name: Echoing Ooze
echoing ooze.text: Battlecry: Summon an exact copy of this minion at the end of the turn.
echoing ooze.howToEarn: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

giant sand worm.name: Giant Sand Worm
giant sand worm.flavor: Banned from every all-you-can-eat buffet on Azeroth.
giant sand worm.text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.

naga sea witch.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
naga sea witch.name: Naga Sea Witch
naga sea witch.flavor: If she had studied harder, she would have been a C+ witch.
naga sea witch.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

majordomo executus.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
majordomo executus.name: Majordomo Executus
majordomo executus.flavor: You thought Executus turned you into Ragnaros, but really Ragnaros was in you the whole time.
majordomo executus.text: Deathrattle: Replace your hero with Ragnaros, the Firelord.
majordomo executus.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

nerub'ar weblord.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
nerub'ar weblord.name: Nerub'ar Weblord
nerub'ar weblord.flavor: Weblords spend all day making giant trampoline parks.
nerub'ar weblord.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

upgraded repair bot.name: Upgraded Repair Bot
upgraded repair bot.flavor: It's the same as the previous generation but they slapped the word "upgraded" on it to sell it for double.

reliquary seeker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
reliquary seeker.name: Reliquary Seeker
reliquary seeker.flavor: The Reliquary considers itself the equal of the League of Explorers.  The League of Explorers doesn't.
reliquary seeker.text: Battlecry: If you have 6 other minions, gain +4/+4.
reliquary seeker.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

sneed's old shredder.name: Sneed's Old Shredder
sneed's old shredder.flavor: When Sneed was defeated in the Deadmines, his shredder was sold at auction to an anonymous buyer. (Probably Hogger.)

sword of justice.name: Sword of Justice
sword of justice.flavor: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!
sword of justice.text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1 Durability.

void terror.name: Void Terror
void terror.flavor: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.
void terror.text: Battlecry: Destroy the minions on either side of this minion and gain their Attack and Health.

convert.name: Convert
convert.text: Put a copy of an enemy minion into your hand.

bilefin tidehunter.name: Bilefin Tidehunter
bilefin tidehunter.flavor: Bile actually makes for surprisingly sturdy fins.

iron sensei.name: Iron Sensei
iron sensei.flavor:
Mechs like learning from him because he really speaks their language.
0110100001101001
iron sensei.text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +2/+2.

swipe.name: Swipe
swipe.flavor: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.
swipe.text: Deal $4 damage to an enemy and $1 damage to all other enemies.

dancing swords.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
dancing swords.name: Dancing Swords
dancing swords.flavor: They like to dance to reggae.
dancing swords.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

animal companion.name: Animal Companion
animal companion.flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

warsong commander.name: Warsong Commander
warsong commander.flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

fireguard destroyer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
fireguard destroyer.name: Fireguard Destroyer
fireguard destroyer.flavor: Ragnaros interviews hundreds of Fire Elementals for the position of "Destroyer" but very few have what it takes.
fireguard destroyer.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

bestial wrath.name: Bestial Wrath
bestial wrath.flavor: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface.  Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.
bestial wrath.text: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.

mire keeper.name: Mire Keeper
mire keeper.flavor:
"Hey.... Is that Mire for sale?" 
  "No.  I'm keeping it."
mire keeper.text: [x]Choose One -Summon a 2/2 Slime; or Gain an empty Mana Crystal.

journey below.name: Journey Below
journey below.flavor: Don't stop believing there's something below.

tauren warrior.name: Tauren Warrior
tauren warrior.flavor: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.

magnataur alpha.name: Magnataur Alpha
magnataur alpha.flavor: Playing him also gets you into the Magnataur Beta.
magnataur alpha.text:
Also damages the minions next to whomever
he attacks.

burgle.name: Burgle
burgle.text: Add 2 random class cards to your hand (from your opponent's class).

wrathguard.name: Wrathguard
wrathguard.flavor: After playing against 5 Annoy-O-Trons, any normal guard will become a Wrathguard.
wrathguard.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.

huge toad.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
huge toad.name: Huge Toad
huge toad.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
huge toad.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

possessed villager.name: Possessed Villager
possessed villager.flavor: It's like a pinata! A lame disgusting horrific pinata.

cenarius.name: Cenarius
cenarius.flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.
cenarius.text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.

draenei totemcarver.name: Draenei Totemcarver
draenei totemcarver.flavor: It's nice to find a real craftsman in this day and age of mass-produced totems.

salty dog.name: Salty Dog
salty dog.flavor: He's recently recovered from being a "scurvy dog."

dark wispers.name: Dark Wispers
dark wispers.flavor: Don't worry; we fired the person who named this card.
dark wispers.text: Choose One - Summon 5 Wisps; or Give a minion +5/+5 and Taunt.

dread corsair.name: Dread Corsair
dread corsair.flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."
dread corsair.text: Taunt. Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.

eldritch horror.name: Eldritch Horror
eldritch horror.flavor: Often wonders what path his life might have taken if he wasn't named, you know, "Eldritch Horror".

mana wraith.name: Mana Wraith
mana wraith.flavor: They come out at night to eat leftover mana crystals. "Mmmmmm," they say.

flametongue totem.name: Flametongue Totem
flametongue totem.flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

archmage.name: Archmage
archmage.flavor: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

nozdormu.name: Nozdormu
nozdormu.flavor: Time to write some flavor text.
nozdormu.text: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns.

voidwalker.name: Voidwalker
voidwalker.flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

lord of the arena.name: Lord of the Arena
lord of the arena.flavor: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

tracking.name: Tracking
tracking.flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!
tracking.text: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the others.

keeper of uldaman.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
keeper of uldaman.name: Keeper of Uldaman
keeper of uldaman.flavor: U da man!  No, U da man!
keeper of uldaman.text: Battlecry: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
keeper of uldaman.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

poison seeds.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
poison seeds.name: Poison Seeds
poison seeds.flavor: "Poisonseed Bagel" is the least popular bagel at McTiggin's Druidic Bagel Emporium.
poison seeds.text: Destroy all minions and summon 2/2 Treants to replace them.
poison seeds.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

alarm-o-bot.name: Alarm-o-Bot
alarm-o-bot.text: At the start of your turn, swap this minion with a random one in your hand.

gurubashi berserker.name: Gurubashi Berserker
gurubashi berserker.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.

sea reaver.name: Sea Reaver
sea reaver.flavor: A little better than Sea Minus Reaver.
sea reaver.text: When you draw this, deal 1 damage to your minions.

warbot.name: Warbot
warbot.flavor: Mass production of warbots was halted when it was discovered that they were accidentally being produced at "sample size."

spiteful smith.name: Spiteful Smith
spiteful smith.flavor: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

curse of rafaam.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
curse of rafaam.name: Curse of Rafaam
curse of rafaam.flavor: This is what happens when Rafaam stubs his toe unexpectedly.
curse of rafaam.text:
Give your opponent a 'Cursed!' card.
While they hold it, they take 2 damage on their turn.
curse of rafaam.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

light's champion.name: Light's Champion
light's champion.flavor: When there's something strange (say, a gibbering demon) in your neighborhood, who are you going to call?

stonesplinter trogg.name: Stonesplinter Trogg
stonesplinter trogg.flavor: The only thing worse than smelling troggs is listening to their poetry.
stonesplinter trogg.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +1 Attack.

twin emperor vek'lor.name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
twin emperor vek'lor.flavor: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."
twin emperor vek'lor.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, summon another Emperor.

assassin's blade.name: Assassin's Blade
assassin's blade.flavor: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

demonfire.name: Demonfire
demonfire.flavor: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP
demonfire.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it‚Äôs a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.

thunder bluff valiant.name: Thunder Bluff Valiant
thunder bluff valiant.flavor: Allowing totems to attack is not cheating.  I mean, there isn't anything in the rule books about it.

muster for battle.name: Muster for Battle
muster for battle.flavor: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" ‚Äì One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries
muster for battle.text: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.

lorewalker cho.name: Lorewalker Cho
lorewalker cho.flavor: Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria, but his favorite story is the one where Joey and Phoebe go on a road trip.
lorewalker cho.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, put a copy into the other player‚Äôs hand.

kor'kron elite.name: Kor'kron Elite
kor'kron elite.flavor: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

grim patron.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
grim patron.name: Grim Patron
grim patron.flavor: If you love getting your face punched, come to the Grim Guzzler!
grim patron.text: Whenever this minion survives damage, summon another Grim Patron.
grim patron.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

crowd favorite.name: Crowd Favorite
crowd favorite.text: Whenever you play a card with Battlecry, gain +1/+1.

dragon consort.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
dragon consort.name: Dragon Consort
dragon consort.flavor: Everybody wants someone to snuggle with. Even giant armored scaly draconic beasts of destruction.
dragon consort.text: Battlecry: The next Dragon you play costs (2) less.
dragon consort.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

houndmaster.name: Houndmaster
houndmaster.flavor: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

doom!.name: DOOM!
doom!.flavor: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"
doom!.text: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.

the beast.name: The Beast
the beast.flavor: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.
the beast.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.

ice rager.name: Ice Rager
ice rager.flavor: He's a lot cooler than Magma Rager.

king of beasts.name: King of Beasts
king of beasts.flavor: He never sleeps.  Not even in the mighty jungle.
king of beasts.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other Beast you have.

forbidden ancient.name: Forbidden Ancient
forbidden ancient.flavor: This Ancient was banned from the local tavern after tucking a 'Dr. Boom' up its sleeve.
forbidden ancient.text: Battlecry: Spend all your Mana. Gain +1/+1 for each mana spent.

shadow word: horror.name: Shadow Word: Horror
shadow word: horror.flavor: It's more succinct than "Shadow Word: Suck Into Vortex."
shadow word: horror.text: Destroy all minions with 2 or less Attack.

dire wolf alpha.name: Dire Wolf Alpha
dire wolf alpha.flavor: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

sunwalker.name: Sunwalker
sunwalker.flavor: She doesn‚Äôt ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Don‚Äôt worry!

argent squire.name: Argent Squire
argent squire.flavor: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath

captured jormungar.name: Captured Jormungar
captured jormungar.flavor: You can keep him, but you have to promise to feed him and clean out his tank every day!

living roots.name: Living Roots
living roots.flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.
living roots.text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.

goblin auto-barber.name: Goblin Auto-Barber
goblin auto-barber.flavor: This guy is excellent at adjusting your haircut and/or height.

demonfuse.name: Demonfuse
demonfuse.flavor: Very dangerous when attached to a demonbomb.
demonfuse.text: Give a Demon +3/+3. Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.

astral communion.name: Astral Communion
astral communion.flavor: Hey!  Moon!  Can I have some mana crystals?
astral communion.text: Gain 10 Mana Crystals. Discard your hand.

eye for an eye.name: Eye for an Eye
eye for an eye.flavor: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.
eye for an eye.text: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal that much damage to the enemy hero.

charge.name: Charge
charge.flavor: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion
charge.text: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack and Charge.

ogre warmaul.name: Ogre Warmaul
ogre warmaul.flavor: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.
ogre warmaul.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.

kezan mystic.name: Kezan Mystic
kezan mystic.flavor: They pretend to be wise and enlightened, but they mostly just hate to be left out of a secret.
kezan mystic.text: Battlecry: Take control of a random enemy Secret.

stand against darkness.name: Stand Against Darkness
stand against darkness.flavor: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

wild pyromancer.name: Wild Pyromancer
wild pyromancer.flavor: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!
wild pyromancer.text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.

fen creeper.name: Fen Creeper
fen creeper.flavor: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn't an actual beast.   Boom, New Name!

the black knight.name: The Black Knight
the black knight.flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
bloodlust.text: Give your minions +3 Attack this turn.

fierce monkey.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
fierce monkey.name: Fierce Monkey
fierce monkey.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

leper gnome.name: Leper Gnome
leper gnome.flavor: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.
leper gnome.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.

spreading madness.name: Spreading Madness
spreading madness.flavor: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.
spreading madness.text: Deal $9 damage randomly split among ALL characters.

thing from below.name: Thing from Below
thing from below.flavor: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.
thing from below.text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.

gormok the impaler.name: Gormok the Impaler
gormok the impaler.flavor: Gormok has been giving impaling lessons in a small tent near the tournament grounds.  For only 25g you too could learn the fine art of impaling!
gormok the impaler.text: Battlecry: If you have at least 4 other minions, deal 4 damage.

fencing coach.name: Fencing Coach
fencing coach.flavor: Good fencers make good neighbors, right?
fencing coach.text: Battlecry: The next time you use your Hero Power, it costs (2) less.

brawl.name: Brawl
brawl.flavor: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?
brawl.text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)

force of nature.name: Force of Nature
force of nature.flavor: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

forbidden flame.name: Forbidden Flame
forbidden flame.flavor: WARNING: This flame is not to be used unless you are a licensed acolyte of the Old Gods.
forbidden flame.text: Spend all your Mana. Deal that much damage to a minion.

duskboar.name: Duskboar
duskboar.flavor: Often excluded from dinner parties.  To be fair, he is very boaring.

starfall.name: Starfall
starfall.flavor: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.
starfall.text: Choose One - Deal $5 damage to a minion; or $2 damage to all enemy minions.

brave archer.name: Brave Archer
brave archer.text: Inspire: If your hand is empty, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.

shadowcaster.name: Shadowcaster
shadowcaster.flavor: I mean, it's not creepy if you ASK before you steal their shadow to make a small replica of them to keep on your shelf.
shadowcaster.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a 1/1 copy to your hand that costs (1).

squirming tentacle.name: Squirming Tentacle
squirming tentacle.flavor: Yeah, I think we can agree that killing the squirming tentacle first is a good idea.

seal of champions.name: Seal of Champions
seal of champions.text: Give a minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.

holy fire.name: Holy Fire
holy fire.text: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.

arcane blast.name: Arcane Blast
arcane blast.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. This spell gets double bonus from Spell Damage.

flame juggler.name: Flame Juggler
flame juggler.flavor: At first he liked juggling chain saws, but then he thought, "Flames are better!  Because FIRE!"
flame juggler.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

imp gang boss.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
imp gang boss.name: Imp Gang Boss
imp gang boss.flavor: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.
imp gang boss.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
imp gang boss.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cult master.name: Cult Master
cult master.flavor: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.
cult master.text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, draw a card.

summoning portal.name: Summoning Portal
summoning portal.flavor: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don't get any ideas!
summoning portal.text: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).

silent knight.name: Silent Knight
silent knight.flavor: He used to be a librarian.  Old habits die hard.

amani berserker.name: Amani Berserker
amani berserker.flavor: If an Amani berserker asks "Joo lookin' at me?!", the correct response is "Nah, mon".

explorer's hat.howToEarnGolden: Can be crafted after starting the League of Explorers adventure.
explorer's hat.name: Explorer's Hat
explorer's hat.flavor: Harrison Jones was disappointed that he didn't get to be part of the League of Explorers, but his hat did.
explorer's hat.text: Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add an Explorer's Hat to your hand."
explorer's hat.howToEarn: Unlocked by starting the League of Explorers adventure.

powermace.name: Powermace
powermace.flavor: People assume that shamans control the elements, but really, they have to ask them stuff and the elements are like, "Yeah ok, sure."

ship's cannon.name: Ship's Cannon
ship's cannon.flavor: If you hear someone yell, "Cannonball!" you're about to get wet. Or crushed.
ship's cannon.text: After you summon a Pirate, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.

doomguard.name: Doomguard
doomguard.flavor: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

jungle panther.name: Jungle Panther
jungle panther.flavor: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

undercity huckster.name: Undercity Huckster
undercity huckster.flavor: Psst! Wanna buy a random class card (from your opponent's class)?
undercity huckster.text: Deathrattle: Add a random class card to your hand (from your opponent's class).

sinister strike.name: Sinister Strike
sinister strike.flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.
sinister strike.text: Deal $3 damage to the enemy hero.

mortal strike.name: Mortal Strike
mortal strike.flavor: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6
mortal strike.text: Deal $4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $6 instead.

master of evolution.name: Master of Evolution
master of evolution.flavor: Will be really useful in the new "Hearth√©mon" game.
master of evolution.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.

arcane missiles.name: Arcane Missiles
arcane missiles.flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.
arcane missiles.text: Deal $3 damage randomly split among all enemies.

bolster.name: Bolster
bolster.flavor: The best offense is a good defense.

call of the wild.name: Call of the Wild
call of the wild.flavor: "Hello. Misha, Leokk and Huffer aren't here right now, but if you leave a message we'll get back to you right away." BEEP.

skycap'n kragg.name: Skycap'n Kragg
skycap'n kragg.flavor: What's more boss than riding a parrot with a jawbone for a shoulderpad while wielding a giant hook-lance-thing and wearing a pirate hat?  NOTHING.
skycap'n kragg.text: Charrrrrge Costs (1) less for each friendly Pirate.

druid of the flame.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
druid of the flame.name: Druid of the Flame
druid of the flame.flavor: Druids who fought too long in Northrend were easily seduced by Ragnaros; a mug of hot chocolate was generally all it took.
druid of the flame.text: Choose One - Transform into a 5/2 minion; or a 2/5 minion.
druid of the flame.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

n'zoth, the corruptor.name: N'Zoth, the Corruptor
n'zoth, the corruptor.flavor: Has not been able to get "Under the Sea" out of his head for like FIVE THOUSAND YEARS.
n'zoth, the corruptor.text: Battlecry: Summon your Deathrattle minions that died this game.

perdition's blade.name: Perdition's Blade
perdition's blade.flavor: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

deathwing, dragonlord.name: Deathwing, Dragonlord
deathwing, dragonlord.flavor: To his credit, Deathwing really took to heart the feedback he was receiving that he needed to be "more of a team player".
deathwing, dragonlord.text: Deathrattle: Put all Dragons from your hand into the battlefield.

southsea squidface.name: Southsea Squidface
southsea squidface.flavor: Quick! Before I drown! Let me sharpen your sword for you.

tinker's sharpsword oil.name: Tinker's Sharpsword Oil
tinker's sharpsword oil.flavor: "Get ready to strike oil!" - Super-cheesy battle cry
tinker's sharpsword oil.text: Give your weapon +3 Attack. Combo: Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack.

raging worgen.name: Raging Worgen
raging worgen.flavor: If he's raging now, just wait until he gets nerfed.

demonheart.name: Demonheart
demonheart.flavor: Virtually every member of the pro demon lobby is a warlock. Weird.
demonheart.text: Deal $5 damage to a minion.  If it's a friendly Demon, give it +5/+5 instead.

micro machine.name: Micro Machine
micro machine.flavor: This card is the real thing.
micro machine.text: At the start of each turn, gain +1 Attack.

fiery war axe.name: Fiery War Axe
fiery war axe.flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

river crocolisk.name: River Crocolisk
river crocolisk.flavor: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

shrinkmeister.name: Shrinkmeister
shrinkmeister.flavor: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.
shrinkmeister.text: Battlecry: Give a minion -2 Attack this turn.

lightwell.name: Lightwell
lightwell.flavor: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.
lightwell.text: At the start of your turn, restore 3 Health to a damaged friendly character.

brann bronzebeard.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
brann bronzebeard.name: Brann Bronzebeard
brann bronzebeard.flavor: Contains 75% more fiber than his brother Magni!
brann bronzebeard.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

rend blackhand.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
rend blackhand.name: Rend Blackhand
rend blackhand.flavor: Rend believes he is the True Warchief of the Horde and he keeps editing the wikipedia page for "Warchief of the Horde" to include his picture.
rend blackhand.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a Legendary minion.
rend blackhand.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

resurrect.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
resurrect.name: Resurrect
