resurrect.flavor: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: "rez plz"
resurrect.text: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game.
resurrect.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

blade flurry.name: Blade Flurry
blade flurry.flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer
blade flurry.text: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemy minions.

duplicate.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
duplicate.name: Duplicate
duplicate.flavor: The one time when duping cards won't get your account banned!
duplicate.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, put 2 copies of it into your hand.
duplicate.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

mad scientist.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
mad scientist.name: Mad Scientist
mad scientist.flavor: His mother wanted him to be a mage or a warlock, but noooooooo, he had to go and be a scientist like his father.
mad scientist.text: Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
mad scientist.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

lil' exorcist.name: Lil' Exorcist
lil' exorcist.flavor: Warlocks have the town exorcist on speed dial in case they unleash the wrong demon.

metaltooth leaper.name: Metaltooth Leaper
metaltooth leaper.flavor: Don't leave them out in the rain. In Un'Goro Crater there is a whole colony of rust-tooth leapers.

piloted shredder.name: Piloted Shredder
piloted shredder.flavor: Once upon a time, only goblins piloted shredders. These days, everyone from Doomsayer to Lorewalker Cho seems to ride one.

auchenai soulpriest.name: Auchenai Soulpriest
auchenai soulpriest.flavor: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.
auchenai soulpriest.text: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.

murloc raider.name: Murloc Raider
murloc raider.flavor: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

wildwalker.name: Wildwalker
wildwalker.flavor: She was born to be something.  She is just not quite sure what yet...

mogor the ogre.name: Mogor the Ogre
mogor the ogre.flavor: Mogor helped reopen the Dark Portal once. You know you're in trouble when you have to rely on an ogre.
mogor the ogre.text: All minions have a 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.

vilefin inquisitor.name: Vilefin Inquisitor
vilefin inquisitor.text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Summon a 1/1 Murloc.'

sorcerer's apprentice.name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
sorcerer's apprentice.flavor: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

hogger.name: Hogger
hogger.flavor: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.
hogger.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.flavor: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.
wrath.text: Choose One - Deal $3 damage to a minion; or $1 damage and draw a card.

windfury.name: Windfury
windfury.flavor: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

razorfen hunter.name: Razorfen Hunter
razorfen hunter.flavor: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once.  ONCE.

snake trap.name: Snake Trap
snake trap.flavor: Why did it have to be snakes?
snake trap.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.

lightwarden.name: Lightwarden
lightwarden.flavor: She‚Äôs smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.
lightwarden.text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.

sludge belcher.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
sludge belcher.name: Sludge Belcher
sludge belcher.flavor: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.
sludge belcher.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

bolf ramshield.name: Bolf Ramshield
bolf ramshield.flavor: Bolf keeps coming in 2nd at the Grand Tournament.  It might be his year this year, if Lebron doesn't enter.
bolf ramshield.text: Whenever your hero takes damage, this minion takes it instead.

grotesque dragonhawk.name: Grotesque Dragonhawk
grotesque dragonhawk.flavor: They say that "grotesque is in the eye of the beholder," but that's just because they've never seen a Grotesque Dragonhawk. Yikes!

ysera.name: Ysera
ysera.flavor: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?
ysera.text: At the end of your turn, add a Dream Card to your hand.

burly rockjaw trogg.name: Burly Rockjaw Trogg
burly rockjaw trogg.flavor: He's burly because he does CrossFit.
burly rockjaw trogg.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +2 Attack.

mana addict.name: Mana Addict
mana addict.flavor: She‚Äôs trying to kick the habit, but still takes some mana whenever she has a stressful day.
mana addict.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack this turn.

earth shock.name: Earth Shock
earth shock.flavor: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?
earth shock.text: Silence a minion, then deal $1 damage to it.

gang up.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
gang up.name: Gang Up
gang up.flavor: If you are thinking about visiting Moonbrook, you better roll deep.
gang up.text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 copies of it into your deck.
gang up.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

gnomeregan infantry.name: Gnomeregan Infantry
gnomeregan infantry.flavor: The gnomes are valiant and ready to return to their irradiated, poorly ventilated homeland!

druid of the fang.name: Druid of the Fang
druid of the fang.flavor: The Druids of the Fang live in the Wailing Caverns. They wear cool snake shirts and tell snake jokes and say "bro" a lot.
druid of the fang.text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, transform this minion into a 7/7.

wee spellstopper.name: Wee Spellstopper
wee spellstopper.flavor: Bane of spellcasters and spelling bees everywhere.
wee spellstopper.text: Adjacent minions can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.

polluted hoarder.name: Polluted Hoarder
polluted hoarder.flavor: Roll ‚Äògreed‚Äô OR THIS COULD HAPPEN TO YOU.

oasis snapjaw.name: Oasis Snapjaw
oasis snapjaw.flavor: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

flare.name: Flare
flare.flavor: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but it's also great for parties!
flare.text: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.

patient assassin.name: Patient Assassin
patient assassin.flavor: He‚Äôs not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.
patient assassin.text: Stealth. Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.

jungle moonkin.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
jungle moonkin.name: Jungle Moonkin
jungle moonkin.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

spellslinger.name: Spellslinger
spellslinger.flavor: Does he sling spells, or do his spells linger about.  Who can say?
spellslinger.text: Battlecry: Add a random spell to each player's hand.

blackwing corruptor.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
blackwing corruptor.name: Blackwing Corruptor
blackwing corruptor.flavor: He got his name when he gave Blackwing some comic books and rock & roll records.
blackwing corruptor.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage.
blackwing corruptor.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

tentacle of n'zoth.name: Tentacle of N'Zoth
tentacle of n'zoth.flavor: Because EVERYDAY is the Day of the Tentacle of N'zoth.

rockbiter weapon.name: Rockbiter Weapon
rockbiter weapon.flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.
rockbiter weapon.text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.

effigy.name: Effigy
effigy.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a random minion with the same Cost.

spawn of n'zoth.name: Spawn of N'Zoth
spawn of n'zoth.flavor: Who's a cute widdle N'Zoth? You are! Yes you are! Yes you're the cutest widdle N'Zoth in the whole world!!!

stablemaster.name: Stablemaster
stablemaster.flavor: Takes way better care of her pets than her brother, Unstablemaster.
stablemaster.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast Immune this turn.

everyfin is awesome.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
everyfin is awesome.name: Everyfin is Awesome
everyfin is awesome.flavor: Everyfin is cool when you're part of a murloc team!
everyfin is awesome.text:
Give your minions +2/+2.
Costs (1) less for each Murloc you control.
everyfin is awesome.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

dragon's breath.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
dragon's breath.name: Dragon's Breath
dragon's breath.flavor: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy?  It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.
dragon's breath.text: Deal $4 damage. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
dragon's breath.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

druid of the saber.name: Druid of the Saber
druid of the saber.flavor: That's saberTEETH, not like curved pirate blades.  That's a different kind of druid.  Druid of the Curved Pirate Blades.
druid of the saber.text: Choose One - Transform to gain Charge; or +1/+1 and Stealth.

crush.name: Crush
crush.flavor: Using this card on your enemies is one of the best things in life, according to some barbarians.
crush.text: Destroy a minion. If you have a damaged minion, this costs (4) less.

leeroy jenkins.name: Leeroy Jenkins
leeroy jenkins.flavor: At least he has Angry Chicken.
leeroy jenkins.text: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.

anima golem.name: Anima Golem
anima golem.flavor: The Dark Animus is evil and mysterious and huge and unable to write sentences that utilize proper grammar.
anima golem.text: At the end of each turn, destroy this minion if it's your only one.

twilight drake.name: Twilight Drake
twilight drake.flavor: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy.  And Tacos.
twilight drake.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.

southsea captain.name: Southsea Captain
southsea captain.flavor: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat.  He has hat envy.

the skeleton knight.name: The Skeleton Knight
the skeleton knight.flavor: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.
the skeleton knight.text: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.

n'zoth's first mate.name: N'Zoth's First Mate
n'zoth's first mate.flavor: Hates when N'Zoth yells "Ahoy Matey!!", but there's not really much he can do about it.

nightblade.name: Nightblade
nightblade.flavor: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

mistress of pain.name: Mistress of Pain
mistress of pain.flavor: Her sister is the Mistress of Pane who sells windows and shower doors.
mistress of pain.text: Whenever this minion deals damage, restore that much Health to your hero.

rhonin.name: Rhonin
rhonin.text: Deathrattle: Add 3 copies of Arcane Missiles to your hand.

enter the coliseum.name: Enter the Coliseum
enter the coliseum.flavor: You have to get past the vendors first.  So many are lost to shopping...
enter the coliseum.text: Destroy all minions except each player's highest Attack minion.

reckless rocketeer.name: Reckless Rocketeer
reckless rocketeer.flavor: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.

siphon soul.name: Siphon Soul
siphon soul.flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.
siphon soul.text: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to your hero.

dark peddler.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
dark peddler.name: Dark Peddler
dark peddler.flavor: I'm offering you a bargain here!  This amazing vacuum cleaner for your soul!
dark peddler.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

mogor's champion.name: Mogor's Champion
mogor's champion.flavor: This champion has learned from the best.  Except for his target selection.
mogor's champion.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.

argent commander.name: Argent Commander
argent commander.flavor: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

skeram cultist.name: Skeram Cultist
skeram cultist.flavor: Just before he comes into play, there is an AWESOME training montage with C'thun.

magma rager.name: Magma Rager
magma rager.flavor: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

eviscerate.name: Eviscerate
eviscerate.flavor: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent:  It takes a long time to get blood stains out of leather armor.

gruul.name: Gruul
gruul.flavor: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle them‚Ä¶ he never meant to‚Ä¶
gruul.text: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .

scarlet purifier.name: Scarlet Purifier
scarlet purifier.flavor: The Scarlet Crusade is doing market research to find out if the "Mauve Crusade" would be better received.
scarlet purifier.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions with Deathrattle.

emperor thaurissan.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
emperor thaurissan.name: Emperor Thaurissan
emperor thaurissan.flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.
emperor thaurissan.text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
emperor thaurissan.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

healing wave.name: Healing Wave
healing wave.flavor: Favored by shaman who study the art of restoration and healing, this spell would feel smug, if it had feelings.
healing wave.text: Restore #7 Health. Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, Restore #14 instead.

twilight guardian.name: Twilight Guardian
twilight guardian.flavor: A result of magical experiments carried out by the Black Dragonflight, it's not his fault that he's a vicious killer.
twilight guardian.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.

blessing of kings.name: Blessing of Kings
blessing of kings.flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

rallying blade.name: Rallying Blade
rallying blade.flavor: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.
rallying blade.text: Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to your minions with Divine Shield.

ethereal arcanist.name: Ethereal Arcanist
ethereal arcanist.flavor: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.
ethereal arcanist.text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.

alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza
alexstrasza.flavor: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.
alexstrasza.text: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.

dragonling mechanic.name: Dragonling Mechanic
dragonling mechanic.flavor: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

force-tank max.name: Force-Tank MAX
force-tank max.flavor: There is a factory in Tanaris for crafting force-tanks, but it only ever made two, because of cost overruns.

windfury harpy.name: Windfury Harpy
windfury harpy.flavor: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

ethereal conjurer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
ethereal conjurer.name: Ethereal Conjurer
ethereal conjurer.flavor: Despite the name, he's a solid conjurer.
ethereal conjurer.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

shadowform.name: Shadowform
shadowform.flavor: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform‚Ä¶ do they cast a shadow?
shadowform.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage'. If already in Shadowform: 3 damage.

power word: tentacles.name: Power Word: Tentacles
power word: tentacles.flavor: Because you're wrapped in a protective layer of‚Ä¶ tentacles?

competitive spirit.name: Competitive Spirit
competitive spirit.flavor: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself.  Or kill all the competitors.
competitive spirit.text: Secret: When your turn starts, give your minions +1/+1.

boneguard lieutenant.name: Boneguard Lieutenant
boneguard lieutenant.flavor: Underneath all that impressive armor, he's just skin and bones.  Okay, maybe just bones.

seal of light.name: Seal of Light
seal of light.flavor: The walrus of Light restores EIGHT Health.
seal of light.text: Restore #4 Health to your hero and gain +2 Attack this turn.

drain life.name: Drain Life
drain life.flavor: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."
drain life.text: Deal $2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero.

mimiron's head.name: Mimiron's Head
mimiron's head.flavor: Do not push the big red button!
mimiron's head.text: At the start of your turn, if you have at least 3 Mechs, destroy them all and form V-07-TR-0N.

wyrmrest agent.name: Wyrmrest Agent
wyrmrest agent.flavor: Keeping tabs on the Grand Tournament is priority #1 for the five mighty Dragonflights!
wyrmrest agent.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.

desert camel.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
desert camel.name: Desert Camel
desert camel.flavor: Dang.  This card is sweet.  Almost as sweet as Dessert Camel.
desert camel.text: Battlecry: Put a 1-Cost minion from each deck into the battlefield.
desert camel.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

blackwing technician.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
blackwing technician.name: Blackwing Technician
blackwing technician.flavor: This is who you go to when your Blackwing needs a tune up. Don't go to a cut rate Blackwing tune up shop!
blackwing technician.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1/+1.
blackwing technician.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

hellfire.name: Hellfire
hellfire.flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.
blizzard.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.

vanish.name: Vanish
vanish.text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

ancient harbinger.name: Ancient Harbinger
ancient harbinger.flavor: "honey, can u run down to the store and pick up some 10 cost minions? thx"
ancient harbinger.text: At the start of your turn, put a 10-Cost minion from your deck into your hand.

cogmaster.name: Cogmaster
cogmaster.flavor: After a while, you don't see the cogs and sprockets. All you see is a robot, a spider tank, a deathray...
cogmaster.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.

hooded acolyte.name: Hooded Acolyte
hooded acolyte.flavor: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?
hooded acolyte.text: Whenever a character is healed, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).

eaglehorn bow.name: Eaglehorn Bow
eaglehorn bow.flavor: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.
eaglehorn bow.text: Whenever a friendly Secret is revealed, gain +1 Durability.

master jouster.name: Master Jouster
master jouster.flavor: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.
master jouster.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.

holy smite.name: Holy Smite
holy smite.flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

anub'ar ambusher.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
anub'ar ambusher.name: Anub'ar Ambusher
anub'ar ambusher.flavor: Originally he was called "Anub'ar Guy who bounces a guy back to your hand", but it lacked a certain zing.
anub'ar ambusher.text: Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand.
anub'ar ambusher.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

thistle tea.name: Thistle Tea
thistle tea.flavor: Aren't Thistles prickly?  Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.
thistle tea.text: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.

blingtron 3000.name: Blingtron 3000
blingtron 3000.flavor: PREPARE PARTY SERVOS FOR IMMEDIATE DEPLOYMENT.
blingtron 3000.text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon for each player.

grommash hellscream.name: Grommash Hellscream
grommash hellscream.flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

silver hand knight.name: Silver Hand Knight
silver hand knight.flavor: It's good to be a knight.   Less so to be one's squire.

infested tauren.name: Infested Tauren
infested tauren.flavor: The Overmind and the Old Gods are surprisingly similar.

forbidden healing.name: Forbidden Healing
forbidden healing.flavor: No one's quite sure why it's forbidden. And yes, that should make you nervous.
forbidden healing.text: Spend all your Mana. Restore twice that much Health.

frostwolf warlord.name: Frostwolf Warlord
frostwolf warlord.flavor: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley.  Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.
frostwolf warlord.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.

obsidian destroyer.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
obsidian destroyer.name: Obsidian Destroyer
obsidian destroyer.flavor: No obsidian is safe around the Obsidian Destroyer!
obsidian destroyer.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
obsidian destroyer.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

arcane nullifier x-21.name: Arcane Nullifier X-21
arcane nullifier x-21.flavor: There was some hard talk between gnome magi and engineers about inventing this mech.
arcane nullifier x-21.text: Taunt Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.

azure drake.name: Azure Drake
azure drake.flavor: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

light of the naaru.name: Light of the Naaru
light of the naaru.flavor: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.
light of the naaru.text: Restore #3 Health. If the target is still damaged, summon a Lightwarden.

deadly shot.name: Deadly Shot
deadly shot.flavor: Accuracy is not a highly valued trait among the mok'nathal.  Deadliness is near the top, though.

humility.name: Humility
humility.flavor: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

poisoned blade.name: Poisoned Blade
poisoned blade.flavor: How much more poisoned can a blade get?  The answer is a lot.  A lot more poisoned.
poisoned blade.text: Your Hero Power gives this weapon +1 Attack instead of replacing it.

si:7 agent.name: SI:7 Agent
si:7 agent.flavor: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities.  Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

klaxxi amber-weaver.name: Klaxxi Amber-Weaver
klaxxi amber-weaver.flavor: Amberweaving is a specialty course at the local trade school.
klaxxi amber-weaver.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain +5 Health.

darnassus aspirant.name: Darnassus Aspirant

avenge.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
avenge.name: Avenge
avenge.flavor: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force".  Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.
avenge.text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
avenge.howToEarn: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

blackwater pirate.name: Blackwater Pirate
blackwater pirate.flavor: "Look, they fell off the back of a ship, do you want them or not? I have a meeting with Y'Shaarj in like ten minutes."

hemet nesingwary.name: Hemet Nesingwary
hemet nesingwary.flavor: It's hard to make a living as a hunter in a world where beasts instantly reappear minutes after you kill them.

museum curator.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
museum curator.name: Museum Curator
museum curator.flavor: He is forever cursing the kids who climb on the rails and the evil archeologists who animate the exhibits.
museum curator.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

nexus-champion saraad.name: Nexus-Champion Saraad
nexus-champion saraad.flavor: The ethereals have their own jousting tournament, and Saraad is the reigning champion.  Also he won the ethereal hot dog eating contest.
nexus-champion saraad.text: Inspire: Add a random spell to your hand.

cogmaster's wrench.name: Cogmaster's Wrench
cogmaster's wrench.flavor: For tightening cogs and smashin' troggs!
cogmaster's wrench.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.

pit fighter.name: Pit Fighter
pit fighter.flavor: What did the pits ever do to you?

gnomish experimenter.name: Gnomish Experimenter
gnomish experimenter.flavor: He's legitimately surprised every time he turns himself into a chicken.
gnomish experimenter.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. If it's a minion, transform it into a Chicken.

mukla's champion.name: Mukla's Champion
mukla's champion.flavor: An elegant gorilla, for a more civilized age.

dark iron dwarf.name: Dark Iron Dwarf
dark iron dwarf.flavor: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore.  Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.
dark iron dwarf.text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.

goblin blastmage.name: Goblin Blastmage
goblin blastmage.flavor: If you can't find a bomb to throw, just pick up any goblin invention and throw that.
goblin blastmage.text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.

vitality totem.name: Vitality Totem
vitality totem.flavor: You can usually find these at the totemist's market on Saturdays.
vitality totem.text: At the end of your turn, restore 4 Health to your hero.

stormpike commando.name: Stormpike Commando
stormpike commando.flavor: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts.  They also bake a mean cupcake.

spider tank.name: Spider Tank
spider tank.flavor: "What if we put guns on it?" -Fizzblitz, staring at the spider-transportation-machine

kill command.name: Kill Command
kill command.text: Deal $3 damage. If you have a Beast, deal $5 damage instead.

mechanical yeti.name: Mechanical Yeti
mechanical yeti.flavor: The yetis of Chillwind Point are a source of both inspiration and savage beatings.

hallazeal the ascended.name: Hallazeal the Ascended
hallazeal the ascended.text: Whenever your spells deal damage, restore that much Health to your hero.

big game hunter.name: Big Game Hunter
big game hunter.flavor: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him.  Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.
big game hunter.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 7 or more.
big game hunter.targetingArrowText: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 7 or more.

reincarnate.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
reincarnate.name: Reincarnate
reincarnate.flavor: It's like birth, except you're an adult and you were just dead a second ago.
reincarnate.text: Destroy a minion, then return it to life with full Health.
reincarnate.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

ice block.name: Ice Block
ice block.flavor: Ice is nice, and will suffice!
ice block.text: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.

cyclopian horror.name: Cyclopian Horror
cyclopian horror.flavor: What are the qualifications for being a 'Horror?'  Just how horrible do you have to be?
cyclopian horror.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each enemy minion.

abomination.name: Abomination
abomination.flavor: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

frost giant.name: Frost Giant
frost giant.flavor: Don't ask him about the beard.  JUST DON'T.
frost giant.text: Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.

violet teacher.name: Violet Teacher
violet teacher.flavor: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig.  And then you get your name on the board.
violet teacher.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.

faerie dragon.name: Faerie Dragon
faerie dragon.flavor: Adorable.  Immune to Magic.  Doesn't pee on the rug.  The perfect pet!
faerie dragon.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.

shielded minibot.name: Shielded Minibot
shielded minibot.flavor: He chooses to believe what he is programmed to believe!

doomcaller.name: Doomcaller
doomcaller.flavor: "Hello, is Doom there? No? Can I leave a message?"
doomcaller.text: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is). If it's dead, shuffle it into your deck.

undertaker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
undertaker.name: Undertaker
undertaker.flavor: In a world where you can run to a spirit healer and resurrect yourself, Undertakers do pretty light business.
undertaker.text: Whenever you summon a minion with Deathrattle, gain +1 Attack.
undertaker.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

tuskarr totemic.name: Tuskarr Totemic
tuskarr totemic.flavor: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

murloc knight.name: Murloc Knight
murloc knight.flavor: Hee hee!  Look at his cute little feet.

heroic strike.name: Heroic Strike
heroic strike.flavor: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.
heroic strike.text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn.

young priestess.name: Young Priestess
young priestess.flavor: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.
young priestess.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.

corrupted seer.name: Corrupted Seer
corrupted seer.flavor: For seers, it's very handy to have your crystal ball hanging right in front of your face.
corrupted seer.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all non-Murloc minions.

polymorph: boar.name: Polymorph: Boar
polymorph: boar.text: Transform a minion into a 4/2 Boar with Charge.

eadric the pure.name: Eadric the Pure
eadric the pure.flavor: Nobody rocks a monocle like Eadric.
eadric the pure.text: Battlecry: Change all enemy minions' Attack to 1.

mind vision.name: Mind Vision
mind vision.flavor: I see what you did there.
mind vision.text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.

bog creeper.name: Bog Creeper
bog creeper.flavor: He's tried other things, but bog sidling, bog ambling, and bog trundling just aren't as effective as bog creeping.

mukla, tyrant of the vale.name: Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale
mukla, tyrant of the vale.flavor: Pro tip: DO NOT BOGART THE BANANAS.

crazed alchemist.name: Crazed Alchemist
crazed alchemist.flavor: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.
crazed alchemist.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
crazed alchemist.targetingArrowText: Swap Attack and Health of a minion.

mind blast.name: Mind Blast
mind blast.flavor: This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.
mind blast.text: Deal $5 damage to the enemy hero.

druid of the claw.name: Druid of the Claw
druid of the claw.flavor: Cat or Bear?  Cat or Bear?!  I just cannot CHOOSE!

savagery.name: Savagery
savagery.flavor: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.
savagery.text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.

north sea kraken.name: North Sea Kraken
north sea kraken.flavor: You have no idea how tired this guy is of being released.

bite.name: Bite
bite.text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn and 4 Armor.

baron geddon.name: Baron Geddon
baron geddon.flavor: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.
baron geddon.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.

blood knight.name: Blood Knight
blood knight.flavor: The Blood Knights get their holy powers from the Sunwell, which you should NOT bathe in.
blood knight.text: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.

anodized robo cub.name: Anodized Robo Cub
anodized robo cub.flavor: It's adorable! AND OH MY GOODNESS WHY IS IT EATING MY FACE

kirin tor mage.name: Kirin Tor Mage
kirin tor mage.flavor: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.
kirin tor mage.text: Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).

acidmaw.name: Acidmaw
acidmaw.flavor: With the help of his trusty sidekick Dreadscale, the giant jormungar Acidmaw is ready to face any knight!
acidmaw.text: Whenever another minion takes damage, destroy it.

earthen ring farseer.name: Earthen Ring Farseer
earthen ring farseer.flavor: He can see really far, and he doesn't use a telescope like those filthy pirates.

scavenging hyena.name: Scavenging Hyena
scavenging hyena.flavor: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything.  Even Brussels sprouts.
scavenging hyena.text: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.

icehowl.name: Icehowl
icehowl.flavor: This massive yeti just closes his eyes and charges at the nearest target.  The nearest Target is a couple blocks away and has sick deals on skateboards.

illidan stormrage.name: Illidan Stormrage
illidan stormrage.flavor: Illidan's brother, Malfurion, imprisoned him beneath Hyjal for 10,000 years.  Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.
illidan stormrage.text: Whenever you play a card, summon a 2/1 Flame of Azzinoth.

harrison jones.name: Harrison Jones
harrison jones.flavor: ‚ÄúThat belongs in the Hall of Explorers!‚Äù
harrison jones.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.

orgrimmar aspirant.name: Orgrimmar Aspirant
orgrimmar aspirant.flavor: "Four out of three orcs struggle with math." - Angry Zurge

siege engine.name: Siege Engine
siege engine.text: Whenever you gain Armor, give this minion +1 Attack.

dust devil.name: Dust Devil
dust devil.flavor: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

twilight summoner.name: Twilight Summoner
twilight summoner.flavor: If you strike him down, he shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.

king mukla.name: King Mukla
king mukla.flavor: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

hammer of wrath.name: Hammer of Wrath
hammer of wrath.flavor: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

shady dealer.name: Shady Dealer
shady dealer.flavor: I have great deal for you... for 4 damage to your face!
shady dealer.text: Battlecry: If you have a Pirate, gain +1/+1.

archmage antonidas.name: Archmage Antonidas
archmage antonidas.flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.
archmage antonidas.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to your hand.

dreadscale.name: Dreadscale
dreadscale.flavor: Let's be clear about this:  ACIDMAW is the sidekick.
dreadscale.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other minions.

worgen infiltrator.name: Worgen Infiltrator
worgen infiltrator.flavor: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

twilight darkmender.name: Twilight Darkmender
twilight darkmender.flavor: First she separates them from the lights, washes them in cold water, and hang-dries.
twilight darkmender.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, restore 10 Health to your hero.

bloodhoof brave.name: Bloodhoof Brave
bloodhoof brave.flavor: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it.  He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

hobgoblin.name: Hobgoblin
hobgoblin.flavor: Hobgoblins are meeting next week to discuss union benefits.  First on the list: dental plan.
hobgoblin.text: Whenever you play a 1-Attack minion, give it +2/+2.

ancient shieldbearer.name: Ancient Shieldbearer
ancient shieldbearer.flavor: Back in her day, each shield weighed two tons and she had to carry four of them on each arm!
ancient shieldbearer.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain 10 Armor.

malorne.name: Malorne
malorne.flavor: When Malorne isn't mauling hordes of demons, he enjoys attending parties, though he prefers to go stag.
malorne.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this minion into your deck.

wobbling runts.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
wobbling runts.name: Wobbling Runts
wobbling runts.flavor: The fourth one fell off in a tragic accident.  They don't talk about it.
wobbling runts.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

shifter zerus.name: Shifter Zerus
shifter zerus.flavor: It's like being able to play with THREE angry chickens!
shifter zerus.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random minion.

floating watcher.name: Floating Watcher
floating watcher.flavor: "Evil Eye Watcher of Doom" was the original name, but marketing felt it was a bit too aggressive.
floating watcher.text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +2/+2.

tuskarr jouster.name: Tuskarr Jouster
tuskarr jouster.flavor: Just could not be talked out of using his turtle for the joust...
tuskarr jouster.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore 7 Health to your hero.

ironbeak owl.name: Ironbeak Owl
ironbeak owl.flavor: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

dalaran aspirant.name: Dalaran Aspirant
dalaran aspirant.flavor: Is he aspiring or inspiring?  Make up your mind!

demonwrath.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
demonwrath.name: Demonwrath
demonwrath.flavor: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.
demonwrath.text: Deal $2 damage to all non-Demon minions.
demonwrath.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

buccaneer.name: Buccaneer
buccaneer.flavor: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.
buccaneer.text: Whenever you equip a weapon, give it +1 Attack.

darkspeaker.name: Darkspeaker
darkspeaker.flavor: People often think that Darkspeaker is the arch nemesis of Lightspeaker, but that title actually belongs to Heavyspeaker.
darkspeaker.text: Battlecry: Swap stats with a friendly minion.

wailing soul.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
wailing soul.name: Wailing Soul
wailing soul.flavor: This soul just wails on you. Dang, soul, let up already.
wailing soul.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

jeeves.name: Jeeves
jeeves.flavor: This robot is a lean, mean, butlerin' machine.
jeeves.text: At the end of each player's turn, that player draws until they have 3 cards.

tomb spider.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
tomb spider.name: Tomb Spider
tomb spider.flavor: Less serious than its cousin, the Grave Spider.
tomb spider.howToEarn: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

demented frostcaller.name: Demented Frostcaller
demented frostcaller.flavor: He prefers that you refer to him by his nickname: 'Frostwaker.'
demented frostcaller.text: After you cast a spell, Freeze a random enemy.

ogre ninja.name: Ogre Ninja
ogre ninja.flavor: He didn't have the grades to get into ninja school, but his dad pulled some strings.
ogre ninja.text: Stealth 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.

target dummy.name: Target Dummy
target dummy.flavor: The engineering equivalent of a "Kick Me" sticker.

timber wolf.name: Timber Wolf
timber wolf.flavor: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

toshley.name: Toshley
toshley.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.

king krush.name: King Krush
king krush.flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don‚Äôt like standing in front of you.

eerie statue.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
eerie statue.name: Eerie Statue
eerie statue.flavor: Don't blink!  Don't turn your back, don't look away, and DON'T BLINK.
eerie statue.text: Can‚Äôt attack unless it‚Äôs the only minion in the battlefield.
eerie statue.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

kodorider.name: Kodorider
kodorider.flavor: Someone called her a Rhinorider, and she's NOT HAPPY.

gorehowl.name: Gorehowl
gorehowl.flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!
gorehowl.text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.

moonfire.name: Moonfire
moonfire.flavor: "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

blessing of wisdom.name: Blessing of Wisdom
blessing of wisdom.flavor: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.
blessing of wisdom.text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.

lost tallstrider.name: Lost Tallstrider
lost tallstrider.flavor: The message, "If found, please return to Mulgore," is tattooed on his rear.

cho'gall.name: Cho'gall
cho'gall.flavor: Even after all this time, Gul'dan still makes Cho'gall go get donuts and coffee.
cho'gall.text: Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.

dark iron skulker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
dark iron skulker.name: Dark Iron Skulker
dark iron skulker.flavor: He loves skulking. He skulks after hours just for the joy of it, but his friends are pretty worried he'll get burnt out.
dark iron skulker.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all undamaged enemy minions.
dark iron skulker.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

twilight geomancer.name: Twilight Geomancer
twilight geomancer.flavor: "Ok C'Thun, repeat after me: 'Your mother was a hamster.'"

harvest golem.name: Harvest Golem
harvest golem.flavor: "Overheat threshold exceeded. System failure. Wheat clog in port two. Shutting down."

deathwing.name: Deathwing
deathwing.flavor: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?
deathwing.text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand.

flying machine.name: Flying Machine
flying machine.flavor: To operate, this contraption needs a hula doll on the dashboard. Otherwise it's just a ‚Äúfalling machine.‚Äù

aldor peacekeeper.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
aldor peacekeeper.flavor: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.
aldor peacekeeper.text: Battlecry: Change an enemy minion's Attack to 1.

edwin vancleef.name: Edwin VanCleef
edwin vancleef.flavor: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.
edwin vancleef.text: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each card played earlier this turn.

gadgetzan jouster.name: Gadgetzan Jouster
gadgetzan jouster.flavor: It's not HER fault you didn't put a spinning saw blade on your horse.
gadgetzan jouster.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain +1/+1.

lock and load.name: Lock and Load
lock and load.flavor:
Rexxar narrowed his eyes, grabbed his machine gun, and said: "It's go time.  Lock and load."
This card pays homage to that special moment.
lock and load.text: Each time you cast a spell this turn, add a random Hunter card to your hand.

dark arakkoa.name: Dark Arakkoa
dark arakkoa.flavor: There's a whole gradient of Arakkoa! This one is on the darker side.

ogre brute.name: Ogre Brute
ogre brute.flavor: Ogres have really terrible short-term chocolate.
ogre brute.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.

cult apothecary.name: Cult Apothecary
cult apothecary.text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, restore 2 Health to your hero.

anubisath sentinel.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
anubisath sentinel.name: Anubisath Sentinel
anubisath sentinel.flavor: He's actually a 1/1 who picked up the hammer from the last guy.
anubisath sentinel.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

chillwind yeti.name: Chillwind Yeti
chillwind yeti.flavor: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

cobra shot.name: Cobra Shot
cobra shot.flavor: "Cobra Shot" hurts way, way, way more than "Cobra Cuddle."
cobra shot.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and the enemy hero.

hand of protection.name: Hand of Protection
hand of protection.flavor: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don‚Äôt know what it should be called anymore.

mass dispel.name: Mass Dispel
mass dispel.flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.
mass dispel.text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.

beckoner of evil.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked after opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
beckoner of evil.name: Beckoner of Evil
beckoner of evil.howToEarn: Unlocked when opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.

consecration.name: Consecration
consecration.flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

upgrade!.name: Upgrade!
upgrade!.text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.

alexstrasza's champion.name: Alexstrasza's Champion
alexstrasza's champion.flavor: "Put more spikes on her.  No, more spikes.  What part of 'more spikes' do you not understand?  MORE SPIKES!" - Alexstrasza
alexstrasza's champion.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Charge.

sylvanas windrunner.name: Sylvanas Windrunner
sylvanas windrunner.flavor: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.
sylvanas windrunner.text: Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.

arcane shot.name: Arcane Shot
arcane shot.flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

rumbling elemental.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
rumbling elemental.name: Rumbling Elemental
rumbling elemental.text: After you play a Battlecry minion, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
rumbling elemental.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

betrayal.name: Betrayal
betrayal.flavor: Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.
betrayal.text: Force an enemy minion to deal its damage to the minions next to it.

soulfire.name: Soulfire
soulfire.flavor: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.
soulfire.text: Deal $4 damage. Discard a random card.

dreadsteed.name: Dreadsteed
dreadsteed.flavor: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament.  Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

fiery bat.name: Fiery Bat
fiery bat.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

misdirection.name: Misdirection
misdirection.flavor: Sometimes it's as simple as putting on a fake mustache and pointing at someone else.
misdirection.text: Secret: When a character attacks your hero, instead he attacks another random character.

repentance.name: Repentance
repentance.flavor: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.
repentance.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.

pyroblast.name: Pyroblast
pyroblast.flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

flamestrike.name: Flamestrike
flamestrike.flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.
flamestrike.text: Deal $4 damage to all enemy minions.

vaporize.name: Vaporize
vaporize.flavor: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.
vaporize.text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.

acolyte of pain.name: Acolyte of Pain
acolyte of pain.flavor: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn‚Äôt work out like he thought they would.
acolyte of pain.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, draw a card.

drakonid crusher.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
drakonid crusher.name: Drakonid Crusher
drakonid crusher.flavor: Drakonids were created to have all the bad parts of a dragon in the form of a humaniod. But, like, why?
drakonid crusher.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3.
drakonid crusher.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

vol'jin.name: Vol'jin
vol'jin.flavor: Vol'jin is a shadow hunter, which is like a shadow priest except more voodoo.

quick shot.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
quick shot.name: Quick Shot
quick shot.text:
Deal $3 damage.
If your hand is empty, draw a card.
quick shot.howToEarn: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

ravaging ghoul.name: Ravaging Ghoul
ravaging ghoul.flavor: But goes by "Ravishing Ghoul" when he hits the club.
ravaging ghoul.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.

flesheating ghoul.name: Flesheating Ghoul
flesheating ghoul.flavor: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name.  It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.
flesheating ghoul.text: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.

eternal sentinel.name: Eternal Sentinel
eternal sentinel.flavor: Just try to avoid eye contact.

snipe.name: Snipe
snipe.flavor: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.
snipe.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $4 damage to it.

silithid swarmer.name: Silithid Swarmer
silithid swarmer.flavor: If your hero doesn't attack, it's just "Silithid Loner".
silithid swarmer.text: Can only attack if your hero attacked this turn.

baron rivendare.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
baron rivendare.name: Baron Rivendare
baron rivendare.flavor: There used to be five Horsemen but one of them left because a job opened up in the deadmines and the benefits were better.
baron rivendare.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

elise starseeker.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
elise starseeker.name: Elise Starseeker
elise starseeker.flavor: A large part of her job entails not mixing up the Map to the Golden Monkey with the Map to Monkey Island.

elise starseeker.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

stormwind champion.name: Stormwind Champion
stormwind champion.flavor: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

bladed cultist.name: Bladed Cultist
bladed cultist.flavor: He has a poor understanding of the law of diminishing returns.

darkscale healer.name: Darkscale Healer
darkscale healer.flavor: Healing is just something she does in her free time.  It's more of a hobby really.
darkscale healer.text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.

deadly poison.name: Deadly Poison
deadly poison.flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

twilight elder.name: Twilight Elder
twilight elder.flavor: Just doesn't understand those Twilight Youngsters any more - with their comic books and their rock music.
twilight elder.text: At the end of your turn, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).

shadowstep.name: Shadowstep
shadowstep.flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.
shadowstep.text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.

fel reaver.name: Fel Reaver
fel reaver.text: Whenever your opponent plays a card, remove the top 3 cards of your deck.

ram wrangler.name: Ram Wrangler
ram wrangler.flavor: Not getting trampled is really the trick here.
ram wrangler.text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, summon a random Beast.

avenging wrath.name: Avenging Wrath
avenging wrath.flavor: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!
avenging wrath.text: Deal $8 damage randomly split among all enemies.

elemental destruction.name: Elemental Destruction
elemental destruction.flavor: I'm not a shaman or anything, but isn't Elemental Destruction the opposite of what they want to do?

arcanite reaper.name: Arcanite Reaper
arcanite reaper.flavor: No‚Ä¶ actually you should fear the Reaper.

nat, the darkfisher.name: Nat, the Darkfisher

nat, the darkfisher.text: At the start of your opponent's turn, they have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.

bane of doom.name: Bane of Doom

ravenholdt assassin.name: Ravenholdt Assassin
ravenholdt assassin.flavor: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He'll take care of the rest.

war golem.name: War Golem
war golem.flavor: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?

redemption.name: Redemption
redemption.flavor: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  It‚Äôs a mystery!
redemption.text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, return it to life with 1 Health.

troggzor the earthinator.name: Troggzor the Earthinator

troggzor the earthinator.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a Burly Rockjaw Trogg.

tinkmaster overspark.name: Tinkmaster Overspark

tinkmaster overspark.targetingArrowText: Transform a minion into a 5/5 or a 1/1 at random.

shattered sun cleric.name: Shattered Sun Cleric
shattered sun cleric.flavor: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink‚Ñ¢!

shadowfiend.name: Shadowfiend
shadowfiend.flavor: Hopes to be promoted to "Shadowfriend" someday.
shadowfiend.text: Whenever you draw a card, reduce its Cost by (1).

freezing trap.name: Freezing Trap
freezing trap.flavor: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.
freezing trap.text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand and it costs (2) more.

sacred trial.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
sacred trial.name: Sacred Trial
sacred trial.text: Secret: After your opponent has at least 3 minions and plays another, destroy it.
sacred trial.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cult sorcerer.name: Cult Sorcerer
cult sorcerer.flavor: No matter how many times we tell her not to, she keeps feeding C'Thun scraps under the table.
cult sorcerer.text: [x]Spell Damage +1 After you cast a spell, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).

antique healbot.name: Antique Healbot
antique healbot.flavor: They don't make 'em like they used to! (Because of explosions, mostly.)

pit snake.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
pit snake.name: Pit Snake
pit snake.flavor: It could be worse.  It could be a Snake Pit.
pit snake.text: Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.
pit snake.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

malygos.name: Malygos
malygos.flavor: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

inner rage.name: Inner Rage
inner rage.flavor: They're only smiling on the outside.

ancient brewmaster.name: Ancient Brewmaster

ancient brewmaster.targetingArrowText: Return a minion to your hand.

bloodmage thalnos.name: Bloodmage Thalnos

lord jaraxxus.name: Lord Jaraxxus
lord jaraxxus.flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"
lord jaraxxus.text: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.

mark of y'shaarj.name: Mark of Y'Shaarj

mark of y'shaarj.text:
Give a minion +2/+2.
If it's a Beast, draw
a card.

soul of the forest.name: Soul of the Forest
soul of the forest.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."

tentacles for arms.name: Tentacles for Arms

onyxia.name: Onyxia

dark cultist.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

reno jackson.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

puddlestomper.name: Puddlestomper

boulderfist ogre.name: Boulderfist Ogre
boulderfist ogre.flavor: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

recycle.name: Recycle

mirror image.name: Mirror Image
mirror image.flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

ancient shade.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

ancient shade.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

injured blademaster.name: Injured Blademaster
injured blademaster.flavor: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

defender of argus.name: Defender of Argus
defender of argus.flavor: You wouldn‚Äôt think that Argus would need this much defending.  But it does.

fjola lightbane.name: Fjola Lightbane
fjola lightbane.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain Divine Shield.

gilblin stalker.name: Gilblin Stalker
gilblin stalker.flavor:
"Shhh, I think I hear something."
"Ah, it's probably nothing." - Every Henchman

explosive shot.name: Explosive Shot

maexxna.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
maexxna.name: Maexxna
maexxna.flavor: Maexxna gets super mad when people introduce her as "Maxina" or "Maxxy".
maexxna.text: Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.
maexxna.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

axe flinger.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
axe flinger.name: Axe Flinger

axe flinger.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
axe flinger.howToEarn: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.flavor: Hey you two‚Ä¶could you stand next to each other for a second‚Ä¶
cleave.text: Deal $2 damage to two random enemy minions.

divine strength.name: Divine Strength
divine strength.flavor: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.

lightning storm.name: Lightning Storm
lightning storm.flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.
lightning storm.text: Deal $2-$3 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (2)

siltfin spiritwalker.name: Siltfin Spiritwalker
siltfin spiritwalker.flavor: The elements respond to anyone who calls them for a worthy cause, even if you call them by yelling, "MRGHRGLGLGL!"
siltfin spiritwalker.text: Whenever another friendly Murloc dies, draw a card. Overload: (1)

mortal coil.name: Mortal Coil

mortal coil.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.

imp master.name: Imp Master

tree of life.name: Tree of Life

starving buzzard.name: Starving Buzzard

starving buzzard.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.

princess huhuran.name: Princess Huhuran
princess huhuran.flavor: She flitters around Ahn'Qiraj dreaming of the day she will meet a sweet prince, whom she can lay thousands of eggs with.

cone of cold.name: Cone of Cold
cone of cold.flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.
cone of cold.text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal $1 damage to them.

gorillabot a-3.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
gorillabot a-3.name: Gorillabot A-3
gorillabot a-3.flavor: A-1 and A-2 went nuts, when they should have gone bolts.
gorillabot a-3.text: Battlecry: If you control another Mech, Discover a Mech.
gorillabot a-3.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

silver hand regent.name: Silver Hand Regent
silver hand regent.flavor: The Silver Hand is the best paladin organization.  The Argent Crusaders are super jealous.
